about_the_game:
• Game Features:

  • Unlimited Skill Customization: Say goodbye to boring skill progression. "Deitydead：Elder Trial" introduces you to a new world where you can freely choose the direction of skill evolution. Your sole aim? Forge the ultimate ability to tear monsters apart!
  • Unique Mythic Upgrades: Beyond customizing skills, each one offers two unique mythic upgrade paths. Players can pick the evolution that best matches their combat style and needs. For instance, Dragon Breath could evolve into an all-around attack or focus on extreme output in one direction.
  • Strategic Gameplay Depth: The options for skill upgrades and mythic skill selections not only shape your combat strategy but also but also directly affect how you tackle challenges in the game. The right mix of skills can give you an edge in difficult battles.
  • Rich Content: Embark on an adventure through 7 unique trial levels, face dozens of bizarre events, and collect powerful amulets and weapons. Find your perfect mix among 18 basic skills and 36 mythic upgrades.
  • Engaging Storyline: Follow Nuwa on a world-saving journey, uncovering the endless secrets of the trial lands. This is both a battle and a journey of self-discovery and history.


  • Gameplay

  • In 'Deitydead：Elder Trial,' a Roguelike action game, forget the mundane, linear skill progression of traditional games. Here, you can freely customize your skills in exciting ways!
  • Want to turn a fireball spell into a rapid-fire fireball machine gun, or a high-damage, wide-area fireball cannon? It’s all up to you!
  • After defeating the boss, you have the chance to upgrade your skills mythically, completely changing a skill's basic attributes. For example, Dragon Breath, which initially fires in one direction, can be upgraded to blast flames in all directions after a mythic upgrade.
  • Each skill has two unique mythic upgrades. Curious about the other mythic upgrade for Dragon Breath? Dive into the game to find out!
  • Every basic skill, after several enhancements and mythic upgrades, could evolve into something no one can predict. Unleash your creativity to forge world-shattering ultimate abilities that make monsters tremble in the trial lands!
  • With 18 base skills and 36 mythic upgrades available, the possibilities are endless—each skill could keep you engaged for a year, meaning 18 skills could entertain you for 18 years!


  • Story

  • Catastrophe looms, and a hero rises! Alone, you'll shred through legions of monsters!!!
  • To face the returning demon army, you'll accompany the main character to the ancient gods' trial lands. Passing these trials earns you the inheritance of the ancient gods!
  • The trial lands, abandoned for centuries, hide unknown monsters... But fear not, you're not alone. Nuwa, one of the ancient gods, will be by your side throughout this journey, offering conversation, healing, and guidance through the trials.
  • Along the way, you'll encounter a host of other bizarre characters and events. Just how bizarre? Dive into the game to find out!


  • Game Tips

  • At the start, focus on enhancing one skill to improve your survival chances.
  • If your health is low, opt to "Rest" at Nuwa’s place to recover.
  • The "Duration" upgrade is more powerful than you might think.
  • Hovering over the skill panel at the bottom left shows detailed skill information—use this feature wisely.
  • Each map has about four items. Collect them before the progress bar fills, or they'll disappear.
  • Every skill maxes out at level 10; beyond that, no further enhancements can be made. Plan your upgrade choices accordingly.
  • Some skills might seem weak initially but can become immensely powerful with enough upgrades.
  • Your attack range increases with your level, becoming wider in the later stages (though not by much).
  • Keep a safe distance while attacking monsters to avoid depleting your health quickly.
